info.title: Strava API v3
info.description: The [Swagger Playground](https://developers.strava.com/playground) is the easiest way to familiarize yourself with the Strava API by submitting HTTP requests and observing the responses before you write any client code. It will show what a response will look like with different endpoints depending on the authorization scope you receive from your athletes. To use the Playground, go to https://www.strava.com/settings/api and change your “Authorization Callback Domain” to developers.strava.com. Please note, we only support Swagger 2.0. There is a known issue where you can only select one scope at a time. For more information, please check the section “client code” at https://developers.strava.com/docs.

get.description: Returns the activity stats of an athlete.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated athlete. Tokens with profile:read_all scope will receive a detailed athlete representation; all others will receive a summary representation.

put.description: Update the currently authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight of the athlete in kilograms.

get.description: Returns the the authenticated athlete's heart rate and power zones. Requires profile:read_all.
Returns the specified segment. read_all scope required in order to retrieve athlete-specific segment information, or to retrieve private segments.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments. Private segments are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

put.description: Stars/Unstars the given segment for the authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: starred
parameters.description: If true, star the segment; if false, unstar the segment.

get.description: Returns the specified segment leaderboard.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Filter by gender.

parameters.name: age_group
parameters.description: Summit Feature. Filter by age group.

parameters.name: weight_class
parameters.description: Summit Feature. Filter by weight class.

parameters.name: following
parameters.description: Filter by friends of the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: club_id
parameters.description: Filter by club.

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: Filter by date range.

get.description: Returns a set of the authenticated athlete's segment efforts for a given segment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the top 10 segments matching a specified query.

parameters.name: bounds
parameters.description: The latitude and longitude for two points describing a rectangular boundary for the search: [southwest corner latitutde, southwest corner longitude, northeast corner latitude, northeast corner longitude]

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Desired activity type.

parameters.name: min_cat
parameters.description: The minimum climbing category.

parameters.name: max_cat
parameters.description: The maximum climbing category.

get.description: Returns a segment effort from an activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a running race for a given identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a list running races based on a set of search criteria.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Filters the list by a given year.

post.description: Creates a manual activity for an athlete, requires activity:write scope.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the activity.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc.

parameters.name: start_date_local
parameters.description: ISO 8601 formatted date time.

parameters.name: elapsed_time
parameters.description: In seconds.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the activity.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: In meters.

parameters.name: trainer
parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as a trainer activity.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: List of native photo ids to attach to the activity.

parameters.name: commute
parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as commute.

get.description: Returns the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: include_all_efforts
parameters.description: To include all segments efforts.

put.description: Updates the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:write. Also requires activity:read_all in order to update Only Me activities

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the activities of an athlete for a specific identifier. Requires activity:read. Only Me activities will be filtered out unless requested by a token with activity:read_all.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place before a certain time.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place after a certain time.

get.description: Returns the laps of an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Summit Feature. Returns the zones of a given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the comments on the given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the athletes who kudoed an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a given club using its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a list of the athletes who are members of a given club.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a list of the administrators of a given club.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Retrieve recent activities from members of a specific club. The authenticated athlete must belong to the requested club in order to hit this endpoint. Pagination is supported. Athlete profile visibility is respected for all activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a list of the clubs whose membership includes the authenticated athlete.
Returns an equipment using its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a route using its identifier. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a list of the routes created by the authenticated athlete using their athlete ID. Private routes are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a GPX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns a TCX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

post.description: Uploads a new data file to create an activity from. Requires activity:write scope.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The uploaded file.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the activity.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the activity.

parameters.name: trainer
parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as a trainer activity.

parameters.name: commute
parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as commute.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: The format of the uploaded file.

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: The desired external identifier of the resulting activity.

get.description: Returns an upload for a given identifier. Requires activity:write scope.

parameters.name: uploadId
parameters.description: The identifier of the upload.

get.description: Returns the given activity's streams. Requires activity:read scope. Requires activity:read_all scope for Only Me activities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: Desired stream types.

parameters.name: key_by_type
parameters.description: Must be true.

get.description: Returns a set of streams for a segment effort completed by the authenticated athlete. Requires read_all scope.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: Desired stream types.

parameters.name: key_by_type
parameters.description: Must be true.

get.description: Returns the given segment's streams. Requires read_all scope for private segments.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: Desired stream types.

parameters.name: key_by_type
parameters.description: Must be true.

get.description: Returns the given route's streams. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.
